location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1671/696 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, on special duty with the Zanzibar Commission, at Aden, to Brigadier General John William Schneider, HBM's Political Resident Aden

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing receipts in triplicate for five hundred rupees and requesting that the sum be dispersed to him from the Residency treasury.One copy of the receipt is attached with the letter.
